name: Realm Defenders
info: After repelling the void invasion, you must unite the guardians of different realms to prevent future dimensional threats. Form a grand alliance with the elemental defenders and create an unbreakable bond between all dimensions.
dialogs: The void invasion was just the beginning. We need allies from every realm.
I will unite the guardians. Together we can protect all dimensions.
The grand alliance is formed! All realms now stand as one against the darkness.
accept: I will unite the guardians. Together we can protect all dimensions.
decline: I'm not ready for diplomatic missions.
